Articles.Content: I'm trying to locate the name of a mod. I was watching a let's play a few days ago, and the person filming it had a mod that upgraded the internals of the command pods and modules so that they could be interacted with. Even included buttons for quick bindings. Any idea what the mod is called? I cannot seem to find it anywhere.
RasterPropMonitors might be the one you are looking for.

that sounds like a handfull of mods at once to me, of the two you described id say RPM found http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/57603-0-23-RasterPropMonitor-make-your-IVA-a-glass-cockpit-%28v0-14%29-24-Jan?highlight=improved and possibly the second is possibly Action Groups Extended found here http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/74195-0-25-Action-Groups-Extended-%28Nov16-14%29-250-Action-Groups-in-flight-editing?highlight=hotkeys

im not sure about the last one though
This affair about an add-on has been moved to Add-on Affairs.
